title: Texas Governor's Plan To Monitor Military Exercises Splits State GOP
teaser: A week ago, Gov. Greg Abbott ordered the Texas State Guard to monitor U.S. military training exercises. Correspondent Wade Goodwyn tells NPR's Arun Rath about the origin of the conspiracy theory  that fueled fears of a military takeover.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
